short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to get a song from YouTube to Spotify by one-click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How Paradify Works 

Follow these simple steps after installing the extension:
1- Open any video on YouTube or YouTube Music.
2- A Spotify icon will appear inside the player. If you can't see it, simply click on Paradify icon in the browser's extension bar.

Love Paradify? Consider supporting this free extension with a small donation! Your contributions help cover hosting and development costs, keeping Paradify alive and improving for everyone. Thank you!
